ref: 1439 *āvunāti ʻ strings together ʼ. [āˊvayati ʻ interweaves, strings ʼ: see *vināti: √vē]
Pa. āvuṇāti ʻ strings on, fixes on, impales ʼ;

Si. (SigGr) avuṇa -- ʻ to string together ʼ, ävinum ʻ linking together ʼ, amunanavā ʻ to string together ʼ (Geiger BSOS viii 555 wrongly < āvr̥ṇāti): forms with -- m -- poss. < *samūna -- , cf. sáṁvayati ʻ interweaves ʼ RV., -- samuta -- ŚBr.
